title: Kolab Community Rules
subtitle: Before you start, please agree to our community guidelines
agreeText: I agree to the Community Rules,
accessLater: You can review these rules anytime from the
tosIntro: By using Kolab, you agree to use the platform responsibly and in good faith. You agree to:
tosAccurateInfo: Provide accurate information in your job postings or service offerings
tosCompleteJobs: Complete jobs you commit to as a helper
tosPayFairly: Pay helpers fairly and promptly for completed work
tosRespect: Treat all users with respect and professionalism
tosNoIllegal: Not post illegal, harmful, or fraudulent content
tosReportIssues: Report any issues or disputes through proper channels
privacyIntro: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
privacyCollectDesc: Profile information, location data (for showing nearby jobs), job/offering details, messages between users
privacyUseDesc: To connect job posters with helpers, show relevant opportunities, facilitate communication, and improve the service
privacyShareDesc: We do not sell your personal data. Location and profile info is shared with other users only as needed for the service (e.g., showing your job on the map)
privacyRightsDesc: You can view, edit, or delete your data at any time through your profile settings
privacySecurityDesc: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data
